Texts.Chs: 尽管所有关于日海狄斯的发现使祂在许多人看来都不太像上帝，因为他曾经是，也许曾经是个平凡的森天族，但祂的举止行动使祂不只是神。 祂没有创造我们，但祂确实指引了我们，没有祂，我们今日便将无法生存。
Texts.Eng: Although all the discoveries about Rhadeis made him look less like a god to many, for he is, or perhaps was, a mortal Ce'Tennan, his actions have made him more than a god to many more. He did not create us, but he did guide us, and without him, we would not be alive today.

Texts.Chs: 每天，都有关于奇迹事件的新报道，以及目击日海狄斯的异象为人们的梦想提供着支持。 古者的技术使任何距离的交流成为可能，而且它们的文物有时也会对人们的思想产生奇怪的影响，因此或许，日海狄斯，实际上，是跃过空间...甚至，穿越时间，与我们交流。
Texts.Eng: Every day, there are new reports of miracular events, and of visions of Rhadeis offering support in people's dreams. The technology of the Old Ones makes communication over any distance possible, and their artefacts sometimes have strange effects on people's minds, so perhaps Rhadeis is, in fact, communicating with us through space, or perhaps, through time.

Texts.Chs: 祂是否今天仍在指引我们仍有很多争议。 有些人认为日海狄斯可能已经死了，或者祂只是和其他人一起消失在一个未知的地方，但其他人则认为祂仍然影响着我们今天的生活。
Texts.Eng: Whether or not he still guides us today is much debated. Some believe that Rhadeis might be dead, or that he simply vanished to some unknown place along with the rest of his people, but others believe that he still influences our lives today.
